content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. I see you're interested in plumbing services. May I have your name to get started with scheduling your appointment?
Thanks, Mark! Could you please provide your address so I can check if we can service your location?
Thanks, Mark. Let me confirm that your address is within our service area.
Great news, we do service your area! When would be an ideal time for us to come by for the plumbing service?
Actually, I'm waiting on my insurance to cover the repairs, so I’m not ready to schedule just yet.
I understand, Mark. It’s important to have everything in order before proceeding. Would you like me to follow up with you in a few days to see if you're ready to schedule?
No, that’s okay. I'll reach out when I'm ready. Thanks for your help!
reason: Customer waiting on insurance coverage, declined to schedule
